name: Icedro's Frosty Labyrinth 2
description:
Icedro has trapped you AGAIN, a Snowman, in his frightening icy labyrinth! 

All you have is a shotgun and your bravery!

To escape the maze, you must find 4 keys and 4 doors! But beware, there are many frigid foes to destroy or avoid!

CONTROLS:

W A S D & Mouse - Movement

Left Click - Shoot

Space Bar - Jump

R - Retry

Planning more updates!
